attributes.description: Dealer demo, Balance of 5 year / unlimited mileage Kai warranty, Balance of 2 year / 30 000 kms Kia service plan, KIA PINETOWN we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre- Owned vehicles, belonging to a multinational company who is South Africa's biggest motor group which owns 340 dealers country wide. All our vehicles have to pass a DEKRA Condition Report, DEKRA roadworthy certificate and an 125 point  quality check at our workshop for your peace of mind motoring. We will tailor make a finance package that will suit your pocket. Kia Pinetown can offer extended warranties and service plans on all vehicles. Trade in's accepted and nationwide delivery can be arranged, call now, one of our Sales executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you with a warm cup of coffee at our dealership

attributes.description: 5 YEAR100 000 KM AUDI FREEWAY MAINTENANCE PLAN HAS BEEN EXTENDED WITH AUDI AND IS VALID UNTIL APRIL 2023 AND CAN BE EXTENEDED WITH AUDI FOR APPROXIMATELY 8k PER YEAR UNTIL 2027 WHICH EQUALS 100 PEACE OF MIND MOTORING FOR MANY YEARS TO COME owner since new, owned by an elderly gentleman who has always treated this car with the utmost care and respect, He used the car extremely sparingly initially and after covid hit he pretty much stopped driving all together. He loved his car and has finally decided that we need to find her a new home AS IF THE CAR HAS JUST COME OUT THE BOX, STILL HAS THAT NEW CAR SMELL PERFECTLY ORIGINAL AND IMMACULATE IN EVERY WAY. Sea Frost Metallic, Black Leather Upholstery is like new and finished with Satin Silver Trim, Automatic Xenon Headlights with L.E.D signature, THE MOST STUNNING COMBINATION FOR AN A4. Fully Loaded with all the extras and luxuries including Multi Functional steering with paddle shift gear change, AUDI AMI AUDI MEDIA INTERFACE, Blue Tooth Connectivity Package, Audi concert sound with SD Card Reader, Auto Armor Smash and Grab Safety Film etc. Perfectly looked after and maintained. 4 TYRES ARE IN EXCELLENT CONDITION Amazing 1.4 Liter Turbo Charged engine offers brilliant power. extremely light on fuel. Impossible to find a more immaculate new gen A4 AUTO WITH DEMO MILEAGE AND TONS OF FREEWAY PLAN AVAILABLE IN THIS PRICE RANGE ANYWHERE IN SA. Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security

attributes.description:
All vehicles are available for CASH,FINANCE AND RENT TO OWN ON SELECTED CARS. Roadworthy are subject to payment for Change of ownership. Our finance is done through all major banks with an additional administrative charge of  R10.000- R15.000 depending on the car. Trade-ins are also accepted , delivery is nationwide and fees are charged based on location. Buying a used car from us means buying Peace of mind, Quality, Choice and Value. 
PRE-OWNED CAR DEALERSHIP IN GAUTENG JOHANNESBURG WITH VEHICLES IN EXCELLENT CONDITION. YOU CAN COME THROUGH TO OUR DEALERSHIP AT NO. 6 JOUBERT STREET AND CORNER ALBERT, BEHIND SARS OFFICES. PLEASE DO CONTACT OUR EXECUTIVE SALES REP. VUYO ON 0763933070 OR CALL ON 0100234810. 

THANK YOU. SIYABONGA. KEALEBOHA. DANKIE.
